summary: Comprehensive three-way comparison of all hierarchical Relume projects (MezTal Information Architecture with 27 pages/8 industries, MezTa 8 with 30-35 pages/12 solutions, MezTal 5 with 25-30 pages). Includes page-by-page inventories, feature-by-feature comparisons across 9 criteria (industry coverage, solutions count, geographic depth, marketing content, wireframe detail, structure quality, unique pages, content verification, extensibility). MezTal IA wins 7/9 criteria with superior industry coverage (8 vs 6 vs 3-4), unique geographic/marketing content (Why Guadalajara, Immersion Trips, Resources Hub), cleanest structure, and highest wireframe detail (10/10). Recommends hybrid strategy using MezTal IA as base plus 3 solutions from MezTa 8 and 6 marketing templates from MezTal 6 for projected 42-44 total pages. Includes detailed action plan with 4 phases and risk assessment confirming 90% confidence in recommendation.
